|brand = Belkin |model = F7D4301 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/30/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Belkin_F7D4301_v1 |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = K7SF7D4301V1 |icid = 3623A-F7D4301V1 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = 141811720000J |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4718A1;BCM4718A1KFBG, CA1001 P11, 954775 P1; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 480 <!-- 480/ 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Parallel |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Eon;EN29LV640B-90TIP;cFeon EN29LV640B-90TIP 189D04A F918TDA; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM68B16CWPA-25H;EM68B16CWPA-25H N178160SJD28521ZQ; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53115S;BCM53115SKFBG, UG0946 P30, 947956 01A; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 94:44:52 |oui = 94:44:52
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, J3 |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, J2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 4.9 to 5.9GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5530;MSC, 5530, 942D;2;InGaP/GaAs HBT;3 mm x 3 mm; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Belkin.XXXX,Belkin.XXXX_5GHz |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG8117F22 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/16/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 722868807422 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0045HHTGW |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 17 |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43224;BCM43224KMLG, CA0942 P20, 941259 4; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = 23 |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141811720000J REV: 01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.

==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== better use [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=78042 CFE mini Web Server] for first flash.
Supported by dd-wrt as of = v.24 SP2 - build 15030 - 20100829
Please insert instructions here
